article_text:
Donald Trump is Hitler. Donald Trump is a fascist. Donald Trump is a dictator.

Certainly Mr. Trump has a mouth, and he’s not afraid to use it. He also speaks to adoring crowds who cheer when he says to respond in kind to activists trying to disrupt his rallies. Even so, the over-the-top claims that Mr. Trump is the new Il Duce may be distracting attention from the soft despotism that Tocqueville deemed the far likelier menace to...

twitter.description: Main Street Columnist William McGurn writes about Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton’s “soft despotism.” She prefers the hidden authoritarianism of the vast and growing administrative state.
twitter.title: Hillary’s Soft Despotism
